core:action.core:comment: From the input parameters, works out what kind of authorisation is required. The outcome represents the type of authorisation required.

core:assignAction.core:comment: There is some lcak of clarity here in that returning the referral outcome on its own isn't enouhg, we must also set one of the referral flags. Also the ManualAuthRequired flag is currently part of ICC input data but should probably be more general.
Reset Signature Required when Online PIN Verified for Swiped and Keyed cards only. ICCs will determine their own rules.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Skip this prompt if contactless - we display the result at 'RemoveCard'.

core:dataAssignment.fromExpression: messageId == null ? (cardTenderItem.reversedOnline && cardTenderItem.isRefund && isEmpty(cardTenderItem.reversalError) ? 'CARD_AUTOMATIC_REFUND_REVERSAL' : null) : messageId
